channel.title: Alex Gama | Personal blog
channel.description: Recent content on Alex Gama | Personal blog

item.title: My Blog Set Up - Long Story Short going through Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Hey! As I’ve documented here I’m documenting my journey in creating content, mostly related to Coding, Architecture, Frameworks but also related to Leadership, Startups, and Product Management, which are topics that I really love and learning a lot.

item.title: Documenting instead of Creating. Starting the Journey
item.description: Guilty! I don’t know about you, but when it comes to personal stuff, I overthink everything.

item.title: I'm a Very Slow Thinker
item.description: I came across this post titled “I’m very slow thinker” by Derek Sivers and I really liked it.

item.title: Weekly Review #1
item.description: Hey! This is my first Weekly Review and I’m planning to do this just to force me thinking about the lessons learned and new discoveries.
